name: Tehching Hsieh
biography: Tehching Hsieh is an artist whoes medium of expression is not words or sound or paint, but his own life. His work consists of five 'One Year Performances', done between the years of 1978 and 1986, and 'Earth', a thirteen-year performance that stretched from the end of 1986 to the end of 1999. Each of these Performances involves a particular vow, a particular contraint, and a particular mode of being. Each Performance is meticulously documented in a manner appropriate to its content. And, although Hsieh never explicitly states his rationales for his pieces, each of them implicitly raises profound, diffficult questions about life and art and being.
